Title: The Dark Knight

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: A genre that relies on the emotional and relational development of realistic characters.

Description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

Title: Tangled

Director.Name: Byron Howard
Director.Bio: An American animator, character designer, story artist, film director, film producer, and screenwriter.

Genre.Name: Family
Genre.Description: A genre that contains appropriate content for younger viewers.

Description: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

Title: (500) Days of Summer

Director.Name: Marc Webb
Director.Bio: This is the director of an animated film.

Genre.Name: Romance
Genre.Description: A genre wherein the plot revolves around the love between two protagonists.

Description: After being dumped by the girl he believes to be his soulmate, hopeless romantic Tom Hansen reflects on their relationship to try and figure out where things went wrong and how he can win her back.

Title: Amelie

Genre.Description: A genre wherein the plot revolves around the love between two protagonists

Description: Amï¿½lie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.

Title: Inception

Genre.Name: Science-Fiction
Genre.Description: A genre that incorporates hypothetical, science-based themes into the plot.

Description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

Title: Knives Out

Genre.Name: Mystery
Genre.Description: Centers on a person of authority, usually a detective, that is trying to solve a mysterious crime.

Description: A detective investigates the death of the patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.

Title: Little Women

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: A genre that relies on the emotional and relational development of realistic characters.

Description: Jo March reflects back and forth on her life, telling the beloved story of the March sisters - four young women, each determined to live life on her own terms.

Title: Moana

Director.Name: Ron Clements
Director.Bio: An American animator, film director, screenwriter, and film producer

Genre.Name: Adventure
Genre.Description: A genre that revolves around the conquests and explorations of a protagonist

Description: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana/'s island, she answers the Ocean/'s call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.

Title: Pride & Prejudice

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: A genre that relies on the emotional and relational development of realistic characters.

Description: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?

Title: Spirited Away

Director.Name: Hayao Miyazaki
Director.Bio: Japanese anime director whose lyrical and allusive works won both critical and popular acclaim

Genre.Name: Fantasy
Genre.Description: A genre that incorporates imaginatie and fantastic themes.

Description: During her family/'s move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

Title: Captain America: Winter Soldier

Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Description: A film genre where action sequences, such as fighting, stunts, car chases or explosions, take precedence over elements like characterization or complex plotting.

Description: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.
